Literature.Title: Short alkylated peptoid mimics of antimicrobial lipopeptides.
Literature.Author: Chongsiriwatana NP, Miller TM, Wetzler M, Vakulenko S, Karlsson AJ, Palecek SP, Mobashery S, Barron AE

Literature.Title: Efficacy of antimicrobial peptoids against Mycobacterium tuberculosis.
Literature.Author: Kapoor R, Eimerman PR, Hardy JW, Cirillo JD, Contag CH, Barron AE

Sequence Information.Hemolytic Activity: Human erythrocytes:10% Hemolysis=33 µg/ml,Human erythrocytes:50% Hemolysis=145 µg/ml,Murine macrophage cells J774A.1:50% Cell death=12 µM
Sequence Information.Target Organism: Escherichia coli(MIC=14.7µg/ml),Bacillus subtilis(MIC=3.7µg/ml),Candida albicans SC5314(MIC=14.7µg/ml),Proteus vulgaris ATCC 49132(MIC=40.0µg/ml),Pseudomonas aeruginosa ATCC 27853(MIC=10.0µg/ml),Proteus mirabilis ATCC 35659(MIC=>160µg/ml),Klebsiella pneumoniae ATCC 33495(MIC=20.0µg/ml),Klebsiella aerogenes ATCC 35029(MIC=20.0µg/ml),Escherichia coli ATCC 25922(MIC=5.0µg/ml),Serratia marcescens ATCC 13880(MIC=160µg/ml),Staphylococcus aureus ATCC 29213(MIC=5.0µg/ml),Staphylococcus aureus(MIC=5.0µg/ml),Staphylococcus aureus NRS 100(MIC=5.0µg/ml),Staphylococcus aureus NRS 120(MIC=10.0µg/ml),Enterococcus faecalis ATCC 29212(MIC=5.0µg/ml),Enterococcus faecalis(MIC=10.0µg/ml),Enterococcus faecium(MIC=5.0µg/ml),Mycobacterium bovis BCG(MIC=12.5-25µM),Mycobacterium tuberculosis H37Rv(MIC=14.1µM),Murine macrophage cells RAW 264.7(50% Cell death=20µM)
